headline: Salesforce CEO Praises Palantir as it Closes $950M UK Defense Deal
summary: Salesforce's Marc Benioff jokes that Palantir's valuation could reach "1,000 times" revenue as the company expands its AI reach overseas.

headline: Asana (ASAN): Assessing Valuation Following New Product Leadership and Cost Efficiency Moves
summary: If you’ve been tracking Asana (ASAN) lately, you’ve likely noticed a flurry of headlines that could matter for anyone considering whether to buy, hold, or sell the stock. Earlier this week, Asana announced that Arnab Bose is joining as Chief Product Officer. This is a notable pick given his track record at Okta and experience leading high-impact teams at Salesforce and Microsoft. Around the same time, Asana revealed it is subleasing a portion of its San Francisco headquarters and taking...

headline: Salesforce Announces National Partnership with Make-A-Wish
summary: Salesforce Inc. (NYSE:CRM) is one of the best enterprise software stocks to buy according to analysts. On September 9, Make-A-Wish America announced a new national partnership with Salesforce to bring hope and joy to children battling critical illnesses. Salesforce will serve as the official matching gift partner for Childhood Cancer Awareness Month/CCAM this September to inspire […]
